About Atarisio ==============
AtariSIO basically consists of two parts: - a kernel module to handle the low-level part of the Atari SIO protocol, and - a set of utilities (atarserver emulates Atari floppy disk drives, atarixfer can read/write floppy disks from/to a floppy drive connected to the PC) - a set of utilities to handle ATR (and other) disk images (adir to list the directory of an image and dir2atr to create a disk image from a directory of files on your PC)
